dct_title_s: A map of the Gold Coast, from Issini to Alampi
dct_description_sm: by M. d'Anville ; G. Child sculpt.
Includes a decorative strapwork title cartouche and one compass rose.
Upper left: "Advertisement--this map has been somewhat improved & corrected, as well as ye names of places accomodated to the English orthography."
dct_rights_sm: Image from the Caroline Batchelor Map Collection courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. If you have questions, please contact the David Rumsey Map Center at rumseymapcenter@stanford.edu.
